Name: Cable Joints & Termination
Short_Description: Established in 1994. Adopt make Cabseal for their product range of cable joints & termination. Range cover Resin cast, Tapex type & later on Heat Shrink Technology for 1.1 KV to 33 KV Power Cables
Full_Description: Achieving vision to get the entire range tested from CPRI/Bangalore to supply quality & reliable product. Established & up dating well equipped test lab. for incoming raw material & finished product. Approved to use with Govt. organization, Industrial houses,Electrical Consultants & Project groups. Infrastructure to Design & Develop the kits as per customer requirement & cable parameters. Awarded with ISO:9001:2000 certificate for Design, Development, Manufacturing, Supply, Installation & Servicing.
